attachments.description: The list of attachments in the issue.

id.description: The ID of the attachment. Read-only.

comments.description: A list of comments for the issue.

id.description: The ID of the issue comment.

created.description: The timestamp of the moment when the issue was created. Read-only. Can be null.

description.description: The issue description. Can be null.

externalIssue.description: Reference to the issue or similar object in an originating third-party system. Read-only. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the external issue. Read-only.
The database ID of the issue. Read-only.

isDraft.description: true if this issue is a draft, false if it is reported. Read-only.

links.description: Issue links (for example, `relates to`, `parent for`, and so on). Read-only.

id.description: The ID of the issue link. Read-only.

parent.description: The parent issue for the current one. If the issue is not a sub-task of any issue, then null. Read-only.

id.description: The ID of the issue link. Read-only.

project.description: The project where the issue belongs. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the project. Read-only.

reporter.description: The user who reported (created) the issue. Read-only. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the user. Read-only.

resolved.description: The timestamp of the moment when the issue was assigned a state that is considered to be resolved. null if the issue is still in an unresolved state. Read-only. Can be null.

subtasks.description: The list of sub-tasks of the issue. Read-only.

id.description: The ID of the issue link. Read-only.

updated.description: The timestamp of the last update of the issue. Read-only. Can be null.
